'''Report'''
Digital Week 2011 in Ostend: 2 presentations (2 x 1 hr. 30) were organized in the public library Kris Lambert (forum-room) in cooperation with the local Zandletters association.

5 members of Ubuntu-be.org took part to the event, in 2 teams.

Approximately 25 interested visitors participated to the sessions, with a lot of questions.

Some visitors announced future visits to the library for help and Ubuntu-support during weekly Zandletters-sessions in cooperation with Ubuntu-be.org. 

CD's 10.04LTS and 10.10 were distributed.
